title: What’s Going on at Ineos Sport? Brailsford and Ratcliffe under Fire as ‘Transition Strategy’ Claims More Casualties Than Just Pidcock
content:
Commentary: The troubles at ailing soccer juggernaut Manchester United echo those of Ineos Grenadiers as ‘periods of transition’ become cycles of failure within the Ratcliffe empire.

Read the full article at What’s Going on at Ineos Sport? Brailsford and Ratcliffe under Fire as ‘Transition Strategy’ Claims More Casualties Than Just Pidcock on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
